execution_plan.description: Retrieve all products whose name contains the word 'mouse' (case-insensitive).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, name, sku, price, category_id, is_active, created_at FROM products WHERE name ILIKE '%mouse%';

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all items whose title contains the word 'mouse' (case-insensitive).
execution_plan.query: SELECT code, title, amount_in_cents, active, group_ref, created_on FROM items WHERE title ILIKE '%mouse%';
